Scroll

API referece - Table of contents:

  • scrollApi
  • scrollApi.move
  • scrollApi.moveTo
  • scrollApi.update
  • scrollApi.getState

# scrollApi()

The scroll api

# scrollApi.move(number value)

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
value number No No No

Move the current scroll

# scrollApi.moveTo(number value)

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
value number No No No

Change the current scroll to a specific value

# scrollApi.update(number [settings.min, ]number [settings.max, ]number [settings.viewSize])

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
settings.min number No Yes No
settings.max number No Yes No
settings.viewSize number No Yes No

Update scroll settings

# scrollApi.getState()

Name(s) Type(s) Description Optional Default value
Returns object with min, max, start & viewSize ... ...

Get the current scroll state
